name: Masquerain
description: The Eyeball Pokémon. Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This Pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction-even sideways and backwards-as if it were a helicopter.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
